review: I went to the doctor after finding him on practo on the basis of recommendations. He was highly recommended. Indeed, the doctor is very polite and friendly. He is patient and listens to the symptoms patiently. For me it was like a one stop solution as the Xray, blood tests and the medicines - all were provided then and there.  The staff is also very cooperative and polite. Overall a good experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recently visited the clinic for my dad's pain issues, and Dr. Raj Kumar was very patient and took the time to understand my dad's problems thoroughly. The medications he prescribed have been highly effective.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In Jan2024..I was diagonsed with Osteoprosis due to which i had a multiple fractures in my body.
After having lots of pain..
I decided to meet Dr.Raj Kumar Sir finding him on Practo based on high recommendations.
On 28 th Jan 2024 i met him and he helped me alot with my treatment and after 10days i got very effective improvement on me

Thanks to the doctor who helped me alot

Thanks to Dr Raj Kumar
